TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, but robot apocalypse, you get enslaved, etc.

I wish that nobody went to skool.

Granted, but everyone goes to school.

I wish that I had a pet Jebediah

Granted, you make him a bottle rocket and so Jeb flies into your house with it destroying him,you and your house.

I wish this kerbal wasn't dead

Granted, but the kerbal gets unstuck.

I wish Danny made more KSP videos.

Granted. They are all 10 second videos

I wish I had a DeLorean.

Granted, but you have to use it to obtain it, so you cant get it.

I wish my computer wasn't broken.

Granted, but it gets replaced with a computer from the 80's.

I wish my Kerbal rescue boat was faster.

Granted, but with the sacrifices made in size it can no longer rescue any kerbals.

I wish everyone could go to space.

Granted, but its not like the atmosphere moves along with them...

I wish for a wish.

Granted. You wish to die, and that wish is also granted.

I wish for Spore 2.

Granted but after playing you ripped you eyes out

I wish for more grammar nazis

Granted, but they are arrested for being nazis way before they can chastise anyone about their grammar.

I wish for a nitro boost button for rovers.

Granted, but they are only 1/32 the power of ion engines and use up all resources within seconds.

I want to "get gud"

Granted, you get gud at getting baed.

I wish for a paradox machine.

Granted, you get a machine that plays that annoying Paradox song by Coldplay. BLEGH.

I wish Pahp Myewsyc didn't exist.

Granted. It is replaced by pop music.

I wish for having no wishes.

Granted, but those nonexistent wishes were incorruptible .

I wish for the fastest possible internet connection.

Granted, but you're unable to access the KSP forums.

I wish for the Scout Program to be revived.

The Pug (space) Program is revived

I wish stuff would happen.

Granted ,Pugs and Corgi's have made peace but then the pugs threw a ICBM silo at them.

I wish i could make my SSTO's and VTOL's work.

Granted but all other designs fail

I wish for Spanish soup

Granted.

But by the time you get it,it has passed the sell-by date.

You can eat it,but it's not recommended.

Granted, but your wish is never accomplished because you didn't write it down.

I wish for KSP v1.0

Granted, but it is still bugged.

I wish for a steaming pile of poop.

Granted, but it fell on top of your favourite food.

I wish for project Constellation to be completed.
